scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Alicia A
scrape.text: 3,8 stars. Belum 4 bintang karena di awal sampai tengah cerita terasa membosankan dan membingungkan, tapi plot twist nya lumayan bagus. Lupakan Gone Girl karena ceritanya sangat berbeda. Unlikeable characters? Of course they are exist in this book, otherwise I'd be disappointed. Lohman family is seriously dysfunctional, all of them. Mungkin banyak yang akan ngga suka karena endingnya unsettling dan bukan happy ending, seakan the devil wins, but this book explores how society and family can be so cruel if necessary in this era. Agak2 keinget novel Akiyoshi Rikako yamg Holy Mother, bedanya "kejahatan" di buku ini dilakukan semua anggota keluarga
